name: cognosco
description: A website where you learn a huge range of things. More content added every day

scripts.copy: npm run-script copy:html && npm run-script copy:htaccess && npm run-script copy:img && npm run-script copy:fonts
scripts.htmlincludes: html-includes --src ./ --dest build/ --minify && del-cli build/node_modules && del-cli build/build
scripts.build:keep: npm run-script ts && npm run-script scss && npm run-script cssprefix && npm run-script minJS && npm run-script copy:htaccess && npm run-script copy:img && npm run-script copy:fonts && npm run-script htmlincludes
scripts.build: npm run-script build:keep && del-cli ". / build / js /*.js" "!./build/js/*.min.js"
scripts.build:dev: npm run-script ts && npm run-script scss && npm run-script htmlincludes

browserslist: > 0.5%, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR, not dead, ie 8-11
